company.name: Novicap
company.description:
Novicap is a European Fintech focused on providing end-to-end working capital solutions to SMEs, mid-market corporates, and public administrations. Through our proprietary technology platform, we offer Credit and SaaS solutions that enable our customers to drive their business forward. Novicap actively supports thousands of businesses to help them deliver impact for their stakeholders.

Novicap has received multiple recognitions and awards. In 2019 and 2020 Novicap was recognised in the Receivables Finance International Awards (RFIx) organised by BCR Publishing by winning the SME Finance Provider of the Year (2019 and 2022) and the Alternative Finance Platform of the year (2020). Novicap has been also featured in the FT1000, the prestigious list of the 1000 fastest-growing European companies, made by the Financial Times and Statista, for three consecutive years (2020, 2021, 2022).
